trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access type information and invoke members across application domain and process boundaries.

To get an IRemoteTypeContract, components can call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method of an object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
To get information about the type of an object, components call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetTypeData%2A> method.
To get information about the members of an object, components call one of the methods that returns information about a particular kind of member.

For example, to get information about the events of an object, components can use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetEvent%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetEvents%2A> method.
To invoke a member of an object, components use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.InvokeMember%2A> method.
Returns the canonical name of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
The canonical name of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.

Returns an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> that provides access to a specified event of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
The name of an event of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to search for the event.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> that provides access to the specified event, if found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Returns a collection of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> objects that provides access to the specified events of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to search for the events.

An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601> of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> objects that provides access to the events that match the specified binding constraints; otherwise, an empty <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601>.

Returns an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"></xref> that provides access to a specified field of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
The name of a field of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to search for the field.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"></xref> that provides access to the specified field, if found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Returns a collection of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"></xref> objects that provides access to the specified fields of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to search for the fields.

An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601> of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"></xref> objects that provides access to the fields that match the specified binding constraints; otherwise, an empty <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601>.
Returns an interface that is implemented by the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
The canonical name of an interface that is implemented by the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> that represents the interface with the specified canonical name that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> implements.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> does not implement an interface with the specified canonical name.
Returns the interfaces that are implemented by the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.

An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601> of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> objects that represent all the interfaces that are implemented by the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.

Returns a collection of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.IContract"></xref> objects that provides access to all the specified members of the specified member type in the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>, using the specified binding constraints.
This method can be used to get a single member, or to get multiple members that have the same name, such as constructor or method overloads.
The name of a member of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
The name can represent multiple members that have the same name.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.MemberTypes"></xref> values that specifies the members to search for.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to search for the members.

An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601> of objects that represent the members of the current that have the specified name and that meet the criteria specified by the memberTypes and bindingFlags parameters.

Returns a collection of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.IContract"></xref> objects that provides access to all the members in the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> that match the specified binding constraints.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to search for the members.

An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601> of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.IContract"></xref> objects that provides access to the members of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> that meet the specified binding constraints.

Returns an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that provides access to a specified method of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
The name of a method of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to search for the method.

An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601> of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> objects that represent the number, order, and type of the parameters for the method to get.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that provides access to the specified method, if found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Returns a collection of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> objects that provides access to the specified methods of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to search for the methods.

An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601> of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> objects that provides access to the methods that match the specified binding constraints.

Returns a collection of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> objects that provides access to the specified properties of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to search for the properties.

An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601> of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> objects that provides access to the properties that match the specified binding constraints.

Returns an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> that provides access to a specified property of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
The name of a property of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to search for the method.
An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> that specifies the return type of the property.

An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IArrayContract%601> of <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> objects that represent the parameters for the specified property.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> that provides access to the specified property, if found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Returns type information about the object that the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> identifies.

A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteTypeData"></xref> that contains information about the object that the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref> identifies.
Invokes the specified member of the current <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract"></xref>.
The `remoteArgModifiers` parameter is used only for components that are written using COM.
Each value in the `remoteArgModifiers` parameter indicates whether the corresponding value in the `remoteArgs` parameter is passed by reference.
The length of `remoteArgModifiers` should be the same as the length of `remoteArgs`.
If you pass `null` for `remoteArgModifiers`, this method uses default logic to determine whether an argument is passed by reference.
The name of the member to invoke.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to search for the member.
The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref> on which to invoke the specified member.
An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"></xref> that contains the arguments to pass to the member to invoke.
An array of Boolean values that indicate whether each of the `remoteArgs` values is passed by reference.
A locale ID to use for locale-specific conversions that might be performed by the member being invoked.
A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that represents the return value of the invoked member.
